email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a freight rate in the low 50s. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We were thinking more in the mid-40s. Can you check if the owner is willing to adjust? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I discussed with the owner, and they are willing to come down to $48.50 per ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $48.50 is closer to our target. Can we agree on $48.00 flat? Also, can you confirm the laytime is 72 hours total? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the owner has agreed to $48.00 flat. Laytime is confirmed at 72 hours total. Please confirm if we can proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, we confirm the fixture at $48.00 flat. Please send over the recap for review. Thanks for your help on this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Recap: Crude Oil Shipment - MV Ocean Star
email_chain.body: Hi John, please find the recap attached. Summary: Freight rate $48.00/ton, laycan 15-20 October, laytime 72 hours, demurrage $20,000/day. Let me know if anything needs adjustment. Best, Sarah
